Package com.blue2factor.authentication

Class Blue2Factor

java.lang.Object
com.blue2factor.authentication.Blue2Factor
public class Blue2Factor extends Object
The main class for validating Blue2Factor authentication on a Java web server
Author:
cjm10

  • Constructor Details

      public Blue2Factor()

  • Method Details

    • authenticate

      public Blue2Factor.B2fAuthResponse authenticate(String currentUrl, String jwt, String b2fSetup, String companyId, String loginUrl, PrivateKey privateKey)
      If used without Spring this is the top most call
      Parameters:
      currentUrl - - where the browser is
      jwt - - from a POST or COOKIE
      b2fSetup - - from POST - can be null
      companyId - - from https://secure.blue2factor.com
      loginUrl - - from https://secure.blue2factor.com
      privateKey - - corresponds to public key that was uploaded to https://secure.blue2factor.com
      Returns:
      a b2fAuthResponse with has authenticated, b2fCookie, redirect,b2fSetup;

    • getRedirectSpring

      public javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse getRedirectSpring(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse httpServletResponse)
      Redirects after failure when using spring
      Parameters:
      httpServletResponse - - spring response obj
      Returns:
      response with redirect

    • getSignoutSpring

      public javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse getSignoutSpring(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse httpServletResponse, String companyId)
      Should be called when ever a user signs out
      Parameters:
      httpServletResponse - - spring response obj
      companyId - - from https://secure.blue2factor.com
      Returns:
      spring response obj with redirect to signout

    • authenticateSpring

      public boolean authenticateSpring(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpRequest, String companyId, String loginUrl, PrivateKey privateKey)
      should be called at the top of every Spring page protected by Blue2Factor
      Parameters:
      httpRequest - - spring request obj
      companyId - - from https://secure.blue2factor.com
      loginUrl - - from https://secure.blue2factor.com
      privateKey - - corresponds to public key that was uploaded to https://secure.blue2factor.com
      Returns:
      true if authenticated

    • setB2fCookies

      public javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse setB2fCookies(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      for spring web server, set the cookies needed by b2f
      Parameters:
      response - - spring response obj
      Returns:
      spring - same thing that came in but with a cookie

    • getRedirect

      public String getRedirect()
      get the url that failures should be sent to
      Returns:
      redirect url as a string
